Species.Author: Trin.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 280 m northwest of Sticks Allison Road and Galiano Way
Habitat: Bedrock slope by sea, in mossy turf, with Erythranthe microphylla, Holcus lanatus, Plectritis congesta
Notes: 1.3 x 0.4 m patch; rhizomatous; very few awns present on some lemmas; palea minute; small patch noted

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, opposite 172 Ellis Road, 150 m north of Porlier Pass Road
Habitat: Grassy roadside, with Dactylis glomerata, Ranunculus repens, Urtica dioica
Notes: Large patch, in flower

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Georgeson Bay Road, west side, 350 m south of Montague Harbour Road
Habitat: Below stone wall of pasture, above ditch, with Alopecurus pratensis, Vicia sativa
Notes: Large patch on the ditchbank; in fruit bud, bulblils in the heads formed during pressing

Species.Author: Boiss.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 100 m east of foot of Mary Anne Point Road
Habitat: By paved driveway, in deep moss over bedrock, with Holcus lanatus, Bromus hordeaceus
Notes: Dense and abundant down to seaside; lemma tips bifid

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Active Pass, Matthews Point Regional Park, bluff east of sandy beach
Habitat: South-facing dry conglomerate rock cliff, with Cytisus scoparius, Bromus rigidus, Sisymbrium officinale, Agoseris grandiflora
Notes: Many plants in a limited section of cliff

Species.Author: Schrad.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 300 m northwest of Sticks Allison Road and Galiano Way
Habitat: Seaside; mossy bedrock slope, with Holcus lanatus, Bromus sterilis, Plectritis congesta
Notes: Common; lemmas to 10 mm, anthers 2 mm

Species.Author: Schrad.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 60 m northwest of Medical Centre on Burrill Road
Habitat: Disturbed margin of flowing stream
Notes: Many in a 4 x 3 m patch

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 250 m northwest of Sticks Allison Road and Galiano Way
Habitat: Seaside; mossy bedrock slope, with Holcus lanatus, Bromus sterilis, Poa secunda, Plectritis congesta
Notes: Large patch

Species.Author: Fern.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 60 m west of Medical Centre on Burrill Road
Habitat: Margin of flowing ditch stream, in wet clay, with Trifolium dubium, Carex pallescens, Danthonia californica, Juncus occidentalis, Juncus pylaei
Notes: Rhizomatous; terminal spike gynecandrous; infrequent in a small area

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 125 m southwest of Farmhouse Road and Jack Road junction
Habitat: Old wet field, with Cynosurus cristatus, Danthonia californica, Ranunculus repens, Ranunculus acris, Juncus pylaei, Leucanthemum vulgare
Notes: Several scattered plants in wet areas

Species.Author: Huds.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Active Pass Drive, east side, 260 m southwest of Sater Way
Habitat: Grassy roadside through shaded Acer macrophyllum-Thuja plicata forest, in dirt and pea gravel, with Dactylis glomerata, Melica subulata, Daphne laureola, Galium aparine
Notes: About 12 clumps on both sides of the road; apparently first record from Galiano

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, trail to beach below Active Pass Drive
Habitat: Shrubby margin near fenced residential property, with Rubus armeniacus
Notes: Several plants, to 3 m tall

Species.Author: W. W. Smith
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 100 m north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: Top of sandstone sea cliff, with Pseudotsuga menziesii, Quercus garryana, Cytisis scoparius, Holodiscus discolor, Galium aparine
Notes: Single large shrub, in flower bud

Species.Author: Boland.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 125 m southwest of Farmhouse Road and Jack Road junction
Habitat: Old wet field, with Cynosurus cristatus, Ranunculus repens, Ranunculus acris, Juncus pylaei, Carex pallescens, Leucanthemum vulgare
Notes: Large 20 x 10 m patch of robust plants; spikelets mostly 3-4 per culm, spreading at wide angles or deflexed

Species.Author: Boland.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park parking area and baseball field
Habitat: Wet lawn, infrequently mowed, with Danthonia decumbens, Trifolium dubium, Leontodon saxatilis, Moenchia erecta
Notes: Clumped plants, infrequently cut by mowing; hybridizing with Danthonia decumbens (Lomer 13002)

Species.Author: (L.) DC.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park parking area and baseball field
Habitat: Wet lawn, infrequently mowed, with Danthonia californica, Trifolium dubium, Leontodon saxatilis, Moenchia erecta
Notes: Abundant in 20 x 7 m patch

Species.Author: (L.) DC.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park parking area and baseball field
Habitat: Wet lawn
Notes: At least some plants chasmogamous, like this sample, with exposed dangling anthers 2 mm long

Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park parking area and baseball field
Habitat: Wet lawn, infrequently mowed, with Danthonia decumbens, Danthonia californica, Trifolium dubium, Leontodon saxatilis, Moenchia erecta
Notes: Appears to be about 10 hybrid plants in one section of this lawn; awns mostly about 3 mm; plants intermediate in inflorescence form between the two suspected parents; anthers thin, 2 mm long, no pollen evident

Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park parking area and baseball field, 90 m southeast of Medical Centre
Habitat: Wet lawn, with Leontodon saxatilis, Prunella vulgaris, Trifolium dubium, Holcus lanatus, Danthonia decumbens, Danthonia californica
Notes: About 12 clumps noted in 20 x 10 m area

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island Ecological Reserve, 150 m east of Cook Road
Habitat: Sphagnum bog, with Pinus monticola, Rhododendron groenlandicum, Kalmia microphylla, Cladonia portentosa
Notes: 3 x 2 m patch; apparently the only population on the Gulf Islands; woody shrub with no sign of flowers or fruit; photo posted on iNaturalist

Species.Author: Hausskn.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Bluff Valley Farm, 110 m northwest of Medical Centre on Burrill Road
Habitat: Old wet field, in wettest sites, with Poa palustris, Eleocharis palustris, Leucanthemum vulgare
Notes: Few scattered clumps in drainage sites; petals white; inflorescence nodding; turions apparently absent; leaves ascending; coma rather firmly attached; seeds appear smooth with fine reticulations

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Gulf Drive, 30 m east of Sturdies Bay Road
Habitat: Treed vacant lot, with Bromus sitchensis, Dactylis glomerata, Galium aparine, Vicia sativa
Notes: Several clumps; persistent garden escape in the lot

Species.Author: L.
Subspecies.Author: (V. Krecz. & Bobrov) Hultén
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 440 m northwest of Sticks Allison Road and Galiano Way
Habitat: Bedrock slope by sea, in deep moss, with Cytisus scoparius, Vaccinium ovatum, Vicia sativa
Notes: Tall rhizomatous plants; scattered

Species.Author: L.
Subspecies.Author: (V. Krecz. & Bobrov) Hultén
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Spanish Hills, Porlier Pass Road, east side, 80 m southeast of boat dock
Habitat: Grassy roadside with Bromus vulgaris, Vicia sativa, Hypochaeris radicata
Notes: Single clump; rhizomes present, cauline blades to 3.5 mm wide

Species.Author: Boiss.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, Skate Park parking area
Habitat: Large soil pile, with Rumex acetosella, Navarretia squarrosa, Agrostis gigantea
Notes: About 8 plants scattered on the pile

Species.Author: (Nash ex Rydb.) M.E. Jones
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island Ecological Reserve, 150 m east of Cook Road
Habitat: Boggy pool margin, with Carex canescens, Carex cusickii, Carex leptopoda, Typha latifolia
Notes: Small patch noted; photo posted on iNaturalist

Species.Author: Nutt.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 50 m northwest of Medical Centre on Burrill Road
Habitat: Thick grassy margin above flowing stream, with Stachys cooleyae, Gnaphalium uliginosum, Juncus bufonius, Holcus lanatus, Cerastium glomeratum
Notes: Few plants; frequent in cleared area by Skate Park but those not yet flowering

Species.Author: (Coville) Wieg.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 125 m southwest of Farmhouse Road and Jack Road junction
Habitat: Old wet field, with Cynosurus cristatus, Ranunculus repens, Ranunculus acris, Juncus pylaei, Carex pallescens, Leucanthemum vulgare
Notes: Few clumps; capsules partially 3-chambered; ligule projections rounded, short, less than 1 mm

Species.Author: (Coville) Wieg.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 60 m west of Medical Centre on Burrill Road
Habitat: Stream ditch margin, with Danthonia californica, Trifolium dubium, Juncus bufonius, Juncus pylaei
Notes: Infrequent; not yet in flower

Species.Author: Laharpe
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 125 m southwest of Farmhouse Road and Jack Road junction
Habitat: Old wet field, with Cynosurus cristatus, Ranunculus repens, Ranunculus acris, Juncus occidentalis, Carex pallescens, Leucanthemum vulgare
Notes: Several plants; alien species, apparently long-established on Galiano

Species.Author: Laharpe
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Farmhouse Road, east side, 20 m south of Bellhouse Road
Habitat: Shallow moist ditch, with Rubus armeniacus, Rubus ursinus, Rumex acetosella, Juncus effusus ssp. effusus
Notes: Few clumps; frequent in wet field nearby; stems ridged

Species.Author: Laharpe
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Community Garden and baseball field
Habitat: By flowing ditch, with Juncus effusus ssp. pacificus, Rubus armeniacus, Rubus laciniatus
Notes: Frequent in wet sites; stems ridged

Species.Author: Laharpe
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Georgeson Bay Road, 50 m east of, 2.7 km due northwest of Sturdies Bay ferry dock, back of Galiano Museum
Habitat: Disturbed meadow with intermittent stream, at margin of dugout pool, with Holcus lanatus, Ranunculus acris, Juncus effusus ssp. effusus, Juncus articulatus
Notes: Scattered plants; stems ridged, culm bases wine red-brownish

Species.Author: (Ledeb.) Schult.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Gossip Island, west side, 1.7 km north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: South-facing seaside dirt bank, with Arbutus menziesii, Pseudotuga menziesii, Lonicera hispidula, Anisocarpus madioides, Elymus glaucus, Melica harfordii
Notes: Infrequently scattered on dry slope; tall plants, in flower

Species.Author: E. Mey.
Variety.Author: Buchenau
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Active Pass Drive, west side, 350 m south of Sater Way
Habitat: Grassy roadside, with Lolium perenne, Bromus commutatus, Anthoxanthum odoratum, Lapsana communis, Geranium pusillum, Lamium purpureum
Notes: Small patch; bulbous culm bases

Species.Author: (Ehrh.) Lej.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 125 m southwest of Farmhouse Road and Jack Road junction
Habitat: Old wet field, with Cynosurus cristatus, Danthonia californica, Ranunculus repens, Ranunculus acris, Juncus pylaei, Carex pallescens, Leucanthemum vulgare
Notes: Several clumps of robust plants

Species.Author: (L.) U. Manns & Anderb.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, 130 m southeast of Medical Centre
Habitat: Recently cleared muddy dirt in parking area, with Juncus bufonius, Gnaphalium palustre
Notes: More than 100 plants scattered over 50 m area

Species.Author: (L.) Huds.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 625 Cain Road, 230 m north of Whaler Bay Road
Habitat: Grassy roadside, by driveway gate, with Trifolium subterraneum, Trifolium dubium, Trifolium striatum, Geranium molle
Notes: 2 x 1 m patch; seen at two sites on Galiano; apparently a recent introduction

Species.Author: (L.) Huds.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Whaler Bay, 80 m northeast of foot of Cayzer Road
Habitat: Backyard rough garden margin, at top of cement wall on seaside sandstone bedrock, with Vicia sativa, Trifolium subterraneum, Bromus sitchensis
Notes: Few sprawling plants

Species.Author: Boland.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Gossip Island, west side, 1.7 km north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: South-facing seaside dirt bank, with Arbutus menziesii, Pseudotuga menziesii, Lonicera hispidula, Anisocarpus madioides, Elymus glaucus, Koeleria macrantha
Notes: Infrequently scattered on dry slope; tall plants, in flower

Species.Author: (L.) P. Gaertn., B. Mey. & Scherbius
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park parking area and baseball field
Habitat: Wet lawn, infrequently mowed, with Danthonia decumbens, Danthonia californica, Leontodon saxatilis, Trifolium dubium
Notes: Abundant in the field

Species.Author: (Blank.) Dorn
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Skate Park and baseball field
Habitat: Large flat-topped soil pile, with Poa annua, Poa palustris, Cerastium glomeratum, Juncus bufonius
Notes: Two plants; the other one very robust in disturbed soil in a wet spring season

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, islet 1 km northwest of Gossip Island, across from Morning Beach
Habitat: Sandstone rock gap, with Rosa nutkana, Grindelia stricta, Bromus sterilis
Notes: Few noted

Species.Author: J. Presl
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 260 m northwest of Sticks Allison Road and Galiano Way
Habitat: Bedrock slope by sea, in deep moss, with Cladonia portentosa
Notes: Many plants over a wide area but infrequent

Species.Author: Nutt.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Active Pass Drive, west side, 70 m south of Sater Way
Habitat: Road shoulder, below grassy bank, in fine gravel depression where water pools, with Aira caryophyllea, Vulpia bromoides, Filago arvensis, Trifolium dubium
Notes: About 50 plants in a small area, just starting to flower

Species.Author: Nutt.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Community Hall, 141 Sturdies Bay Road
Habitat: Sloping parking area, in compacted soil, with Veronica arvensis, Plantago lanceolata, Matricaria discoidea
Notes: Small patch; also about 200 plants in 2 x 2 m area by picnic table; just one flower noted in the shaded habitat

Species.Author: Nutt.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, parking area
Habitat: Compacted fine gravel, with Matricaria discoidea, Plantago major, Trifolium repens, Poa annua, Polygonum arenastrum
Notes: Few scattered plants, mostly with flowering heads

Species.Author: (Schult.) Hitchc.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Gossip Island, east tip, 1.2 km north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: Sandstone rock shore, in gaps above high tide line
Notes: About 20 clumps

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Sturdies Bay Road, south side, 75 m east of Gardner Road
Habitat: Grassy roadside, below forest slope, with Dactylis glomerata, Anthoxanthum odoratum, Anthriscus caucalis, Vicia sativa, Bellis perennis, Montia parvifolia
Notes: Single smal low dense patch, 1 x 1.5 m; apparently first record from Galiano

Species.Author: Crantz
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Bluff Valley Farm, 90 m northwest of Medical Centre on Burrill Road
Habitat: Old wet field, in wettest sites, with Poa palustris, Ranunculus repens
Notes: Two little patches noted in the field

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Georgeson Bay Road, 13 m east of, 330 m south of Montague Harbour Road
Habitat: Pasture field, with Festuca rubra, Vicia hirsuta, Leucanthemum vulgare, Trifolium dubium, Hypochaeris radicata
Notes: Small patch of a few plants; square stems with sparse hairs mostly on one side; galea tip bluish; alien taxon

Species.Author: (Ell.) Torr. & Gray
Subspecies.Author: (S. Wats.) Crow
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, islet 1 km northwest of Gossip Island, across from Morning Beach
Habitat: Vernal pool, trampled by Canada geese, with Calandrinia cilata, Aira praecox, Aira caryophyllea
Notes: Many plants in a few dry muck pools; petals white; seeds variably obliquely triangular with a slight abaxial groove

Species.Author: (Ell.) Torr. & Gray
Subspecies.Author: (S. Wats.) Crow
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Montague Harbour Provincial Campground
Habitat: Grassy campsite lawn, partially flooded, with Poa annua, Vulpia bromoides, Plantago lanceolata, Bellis perennis, Juncus bufonius, Triphysaria pusilla, Sagina procumbens
Notes: Abundant in a small area; erect annual; petals white; seeds angular, not plumply rounded

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Burrill Road, west side, 650 m south of Jack Road
Habitat: Sandstone and dirt roadbank, with Sherardia arvensis, Vicia hirsuta, Anthoxanthum odoratum, Dactylis glomerata, Aira praecox, Leucanthemum vulgare, Trifolium dubium
Notes: 12 x 2 m patch, only a single flowering stalk seen; plant flowered in press; inforescence nodding in bud

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Gossip Island, west side, 1.7 km north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: Sandstone dirt at boulder shore below steep slope, with Trifolium willdenovii, Bromus sterilis, Anthoxanthum odoratum
Notes: Annual weed; large plants in a cool wet spring season

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 400 m northeast of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: Common on seaside sandstone bedrock, with abundant Vulpia myuros, Aira caryophyllea, Aphanes occidentalis, Trifolium dubium
Notes: Some large robust plants in a cool wet spring season

Species.Author: E.P. Bicknell
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Galiano Lions Park on Burrill Road, between Community Garden and baseball field
Habitat: By flowing ditch, in bare patch on ditchbank, with Scirpus microcarpus, Juncus bufonius, Carex viridula, Juncus pylaei
Notes: Few plants in one site only; tepals 12-14 mm; fresh stems to 2.1 mm wide

Species.Author: Ruiz & Pav.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 75 m east of foot of Mary Anne Point Road
Habitat: Path to sea; under Pseudotsuga menziesii and Quercus garryana; moist depression with Plectritis congesta, Poa annua, Bellis perennis
Notes: Small patch

Species.Author: Ruiz & Pav.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Lovers Leap Rest Stop, 30 m southeast of Porlier Pass Road
Habitat: Slightly trampled ground at viewpoint, with Cynosurus echinatus, Plantago lanceolata, Veronica arvensis, Acmispon parviflorus
Notes: Large patch; scattered in viewpoint area

Species.Author: (Huds.) Link
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 100 m north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: Sea cliff, with Pseudotsuga menziesii, Quercus garryana, Cytisis scoparius, Holodiscus discolor, Galium aparine
Notes: Abundant; now a common weed on Galiano

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Active Pass Drive, west side, 70 m south of Sater Way
Habitat: Road shoulder, in fine gravel, with Aira caryophyllea, Vulpia bromoides, Trifolium dubium
Notes: Abundant roadside weed in the vicinity

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Farmhouse Road, east side, 35 m south of Bellhouse Road
Habitat: Driveway of farm, fine gravel, with Vulpia bromoides, Trifolium dubium, Poa annua, Rumex acetosella, Matricaria discoidea
Notes: Small patch of dense plants; established in several places on Galiano

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Montague Harbour Marine Park
Habitat: Day Use picnic area near beach; abundant in rough lawn and in compacted sandy ground around picnic tables, with Plantago lanceolata, Lolium perenne, Trifolium dubium
Notes: Spreading annual with compact heads of pink flowers

Species.Author: Pursh
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Gossip Island, west side, 1.7 km north of Sturdies Bay ferry dock
Habitat: Eroded sandstone slope, Arbutus menziesii, Pseudotuga menziesii, Lonicera hispidula, Anisocarpus madioides, Elymus glaucus, Koeleria macrantha
Notes: Abundant, often large sprawling plants in a cool wet spring season

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Penfold Road, west side, 170 m north of Bluff Road
Habitat: Grassy roadside, with Trifolium subterraneum, Trifolium dubium, Bromus hordeaceus, Bromus sterilis, Anthoxanthum odoratum
Notes: Large population; becoming a locally frequent weed along roadsides on Galiano

Species.Author: L.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, 130 m southwest of Farmhouse Road and Jack Road junction
Habitat: Wet track through old field, with Phalaris arundinacea, Cynosurus cristatus, Rumex crispus, Ranunculus repens, Ranunculus acris, Trifolium dubium
Notes: Single plant, but also a weed at the nearby skateboard park; glabrous

Species.Author: Poir.
Location: Gulf Islands, Galiano Island, Community Garden on Burrill Road
Habitat: Abundant in a box plot not yet planted
Notes: Mostly pulled out and lying as compost
